import React from'react';import api from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskList(_ref){let{tasks,onTaskDeleted}=_ref;const deleteTask=async id=>{try{await api.delete("/tasks/".concat(id));onTaskDeleted(id);// Notify App to remove task from the state
}catch(error){console.error('Error deleting task:',error);}};const groupedTasks=tasks.reduce((acc,task)=>{if(!acc[task.category]){acc[task.category]=[];}acc[task.category].push(task);return acc;},{});const sortTasksByPriority=tasks=>{const priorityOrder={high:3,medium:2,low:1};return tasks.sort((a,b)=>priorityOrder[b.priority]-priorityOrder[a.priority]);};const categoryOrder=['Urgent','Work','Personal','General'];const sortedCategories=Object.keys(groupedTasks).sort((a,b)=>categoryOrder.indexOf(a)-categoryOrder.indexOf(b));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Task List"}),sortedCategories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{border:"1",style:{width:'100%',marginBottom:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Task Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Due Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Priority"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:sortTasksByPriority(groupedTasks[category]).map(task=>{const formattedDate=new Date(task.dueDate).toLocaleString();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:task.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:formattedDate}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:task.priority}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteTask(task._id),children:"Delete"})})]},task._id);})})]})]},category))]});}export default TaskList;
